title: Yosemite National Park
name: Lower Yosemite Fall
address: Starts at the Lower Yosemite Fall shuttle bus stop (#6)
content: [[File:Handicap reverse blue background.svg|text-bottom|15px|frameless]] This easy, paved one-mile loop trail provides a good view of the falls with a close-up view of the lower fall. (Note: this waterfall is often dry from August through October.) The eastern part of the loop is wheelchair accessible.  Since the trailhead falls on the Northside Dr, it's better to see the falls on your way out of the Yosemite Valley.
